title: Vessel, 1300–1400
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of Charles W. Gould
description: Bird-shaped with stirrup spout; horizontal ovoid body with applied wings, square tail and head of toucan.  Square-section stirrup with rounded spout (chipped).

tombstone.epitaph:
Vessel, 1300–1400.
1300–1400. earthenware. Museum purchase through gift of Charles W. Gould. 1962-219-2.
